emuInput.TitMainTitle: Lois Weaver Watson and Threasa Weaver wearing matching dance costumes, with one long sleeved and sash around waist, posing in fourth position, in the Horizon room with leaf patterned carpet and marble baseboard for Junior Mothers' "Smart Affairs of 1961"
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 9, 1961, page A12 reads: "Like Young - A pair of sisters teamed up to do a number that had the crowd yelling for more. Dancing to the tune of 'Like Young,' the sisters are Lois Watson and Theresa Weaver. Lois did the choreography for the show." Headline reads: "Over 500 Attend Junior Mothers' 'Smart Affairs of 1961'"
